content: One-of-a-kind hats were specifically created for this occasion by royal fansRoyal fans excitedly waiting for the Coronation at The Mall are providing much entertainment for visitors with their wild and wonderful headwear.

The extraordinary hats are one of a kind and were created specifically for this occasion by the royal fans.While setting up camp at The Mall to get the best view of King Charles III and the royal family, the hat enthusiasts proudly showed off their creations.From intricate sun hats displaying pictures or even figurines of King Charles III and Queen Consort Camilla, Union Jack beanies sporting a variety of royal-themed pins to a bucket hat with various UK flags and a tiara on top - the royal fans went all out this year in their fancy headwear.MailOnline presents the royal fans sporting the best hats in the land:
